title: Covid-19 Vaccine Frequently Asked Questions
content:
A low risk or reinfection has generally been seen in the first few months following infection.
There are some reasons you might get a vaccine sooner rather than later:
Your risk of severe COVID-19
If COVID-19 is causing a lot of
illness in your community
Learn more about the
benefits of getting a COVID-19 vaccine
.
Getting Children and Teens Vaccinated
Are the COVID-19 vaccines for children the same ones that are given to adults?
